code: export function addMinutes(date){var minutes=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:45;date.setMinutes(date.getMinutes()+minutes);return date.getHours()+":"+date.getMinutes();}export function addRemaining(hoursAndMinutes){var hoursAndMinutesList=hoursAndMinutes.split(":");hoursAndMinutesList=hoursAndMinutesList.map(function(element,index){if(element.length===1&&index===0){return"0"+element;}else if(element.length===1&&index===1){return element+"0";}else return element;});return hoursAndMinutesList.join(":");}
